title: BHDT VIETNAM ROBOTICS
description:
Vietnam Robotics Electronic Warranty is an application that allows to look up genuine product information online, allowing all users to access and look up information about equipment and products sold by Vietnam Robotics , including features:

► WARRANTY ACTIVATION

Activating product warranty, allowing customer's purchase information to be recorded on the system, ensuring the interests of consumers.

► WARRANTY SEARCH, REPAIR

The application makes it easy to track the device's warranty and repair history

► LOOKING FOR GENUINE PRODUCTS WHEN SUCCESSFUL ACTIVATION

The feature helps you to look up product information directly, quality assurance and brand.

► BOOK YOUR SCHEDULE ONLINE

Schedule a warranty, Report broken information, product errors to the warranty center.
► WARRANTY COLLECTION MANAGEMENT FOR STATION AND TECHNICAL STAFF
► MANAGEMENT OF AGENT PRODUCTS
► AGENT ORDER MANAGEMENT
► NEWS
► ERROR CODE

The software uses product information including: scratch code and serial number to confirm the dealer and activate the electronic warranty for the end customer.
Vietnam Robotics – Connecting the Future
With the desire to bring Vietnamese families a more convenient, intelligent and comfortable life, Vietnam Robotics offers solutions that are smart household products for house cleaning: robot vacuum cleaner, glass cleaning robot... Products committed to genuine distribution of brands: Neato, Ecovacs.
MISSION VISION
Vietnam Robotics was born with the mission for a more comfortable, modern and better life for Vietnamese people.
Vision – Vietnam Robotics becomes a leading company in the field of import and distribution of smart products applied to life such as: robot vacuum cleaner, glass cleaning robot, smart household goods and technology products other
Market development
To fulfill its mission, Vietnam Robotics aims to expand its agent system nationwide, with the desire to bring the best, fastest and most convenient products to consumers.
With an open agency policy and a win-win mindset, Vietnam Robotics brings opportunities for successful cooperation to all individuals and businesses with the same vision for a good life for Vietnamese people.
